name: Romancing Fantasy 1.5
description:
• Story *

The gods created three continents...
Each faced an uprising...

Become the ruler of the kingdom, lay with the women, battle the enemies!
The world is yours to adventure in your own way.

Samurai presents Romancing Fantasy, a massively populated assault RPG
inspired by classics like Fnal Fantasy and Romancing SGa.

  • Tons of erotic scenes!! *

113 characters!
Over 200 main CGs!
An inconceivable 5182 total incl. variations!
Can you see all the H content?

The average playthrough takes the creator himself about 20 hours to complete!

  • Side view battles!! *

Classic RPG showdowns with hulking enemies!
Freely arrange your miniature pixelated party members in battle formation!
The difficulty is low so you can make quick progress!

  • Turn actions into profit!! *

Battles yield financial rewards for your kingdom!
Make war to make money but also at the brothel and through events!
Never worry about having enough! Spend big and spend often,
level up your characters with that strongest of commodities: cash!
